preferences

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • preferences.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class offers static methods for set/get user information like as nickname, router's port and other preferences
    Author:
    Francesco Cozzolino, Stefano Belli

      • loadConfigFile

        public static void loadConfigFile()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Check if config/conf.config file exists and, if not, build it with default indentation. In addition, it checks also if the ports and ip entered are valid or not, and shows an error message otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
